verses.name: Acts 21:13
verses.text: Then Paul answered, What mean ye to weep and to break mine heart? for I am ready not to be bound only, but also to die at Jerusalem for the name of the Lord Jesus.

verses.name: Acts 21:14
verses.text: And when he would not be persuaded, we ceased, saying, The will of the Lord be done.

verses.name: Acts 21:15
verses.text: And after those days we took up our carriages, and went up to Jerusalem.

verses.name: Acts 21:16
verses.text: There went with us also certain of the disciples of Cesarea, and brought with them one Mnason of Cyprus, an old disciple, with whom we should lodge.
